attributes.title: Ewwww trump
attributes.review: 🤮 worst app ever! It revolves around one of the most evil people to walk the planet! Trump. Yes, the lying, petty, racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic cheeto puff. Who the heck wants him for a president anyway? I thought he died from hydroxychlorine! Just thinking about him makes me wanna throw myself off a bridge!

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: why would u even download this what’s the point of supporting a racist homophobic and letting them control our country he’s obviously not controlling anything bc ppl are still rioting AND ppl are still being diagnosed with covid

attributes.title: buggy and glitches out all the time
attributes.review: took 6 hours just to download after restarting my phone several times and always crashes, when it finally did finish as per usual our orange cheeto of a president disappointed us once again by sharing several fake news article upon opening the app, dont waste your time on this

attributes.title: Would give 0 stars if I could
attributes.review: Terrible app! To the other reviews saying that all the bad reviews are coming from children who can’t even vote ... I assure you I will be voting 2020 and not for a disgusting racist.

President 🍊s app is horrible it took my 3 weeks to download and when it downloaded it played weird music and my siblings started going insane and choked my mom and when I reported it president orange deleted it

attributes.title: try again luv
attributes.review: i tried to download this app to see what the cheeto was up to but it took super long to actually download and when it did i got spam messages and the app was glitching out and it’s just a terrible case :( honestly disappointing that the problematic “president” can’t develop a good app but trying to ban another one while he has kids locked up in cages 👁👄👁 it’s a no from me

attributes.title: This app is terrible
attributes.review: This app is horrendous. After the monsters eight weeks to download it then crashes very easily I would not recommend this up to anyone.

attributes.title: Bad 😾😾😾
attributes.review: I had low hopes but I guess they weren’t low enough 😡😡 it’s the worst app and it should be taken off 🥳 it’s an embarrassment for apple 🍎 to have this app so I would recommend taking it off 😺👍🏼

attributes.title: Bad!
attributes.review: Worst app ever!! It took a week to download and when it finally did download my phone wouldn’t stop glitching. Don’t get this app it’s not worth it. I guess this Cheeto just can’t do anything right🙄

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD
